name: CaramelApple
description:
CaramelApple is an enchanting 2.5D doll-style model that excels in alluring and adorable characters. With its exceptional capabilities, this model is proficient in a wide range of genres, including fantasy, sci-fi, and beyond.

CaramelApple, with its distinct charm, leans towards a doll-like aesthetic, setting it apart from its counterpart, CandyApple, which leans more towards an anime-like style.

This caramel is made by heating sugar and adding cream, and milk to create a rich, sticky, and golden-brown sauce. It has a smooth and creamy texture with a deep, caramelized flavor.

**Please note that you are solely responsible for any images created using this model.

**If the hand generation results are unsatisfactory or if a blue glitch is visible, it is recommended to try using a higher step or hi-res fix for generating improved results.

Available steps: 20

Recommend steps: 30+

VAE: Baked (vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
If you find value in this model and want to help take it to new heights, you can support upgrading my GPU on Ko-fi or Buy Me a Coffee

If there's anything you need, please don't hesitate to let me know.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Here are my other models:

CalicoMix a general-purpose model.

CalicoMixReal a realistic version of CalicoMix.

CalicoMix DC a simplified variant with a cuter appeal.

CottonCandy Pastel a colorful pastel model.

FluffyMarshmallow focus on cute/kawaii characters.

CandyApple a cute anime-like 2.5D style characters.
